name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Innovation**

Footprints Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of genres and cultures. From electronic beats to Malian desert blues, psychedelic folk, and Anatolian rock, the festival highlights a global and genre-defying musical experience. With no dominant genre, the lineup embodies a spirit of exploration, blending traditional sounds like Armenian folk and traditional Iranian music with modern styles like minimalist electropop and 80s-inspired grooves. This year's average artist rating of 7.73 reflects the festival's commitment to quality and innovation, with 9 out of 11 acts rated 8 or higher.

The festivalâ€™s international roster spans 10 countries, with a strong European presence from Germany, the Netherlands, Spain, and France, alongside artists from Iran, Turkey, Nigeria, and Brazil. Footprints 2026 also places a spotlight on diversity, with 7 out of 11 artists identifying as people of color and a mix of male, female, and mixed-gender acts represented. This commitment to inclusivity ensures a vibrant and varied musical experience for all attendees.

By bridging cultural and musical divides, Footprints Festival 2026 creates a platform for connection, collaboration, and discovery. With all artists featured on Spotify, attendees can explore the lineup ahead of time and immerse themselves in a harmonious celebration of global sounds and creative expression.
